misc.pingpong:
The prefix for this server is `{0}` and the help command is `{0}help`
If you are in need of more help, you can join the **[Support Server]({1})**.
cooldown_msgs: Didn't your parents tell you that [patience is a virtue](http://www.patience-is-a-virtue.org/)? Calm down and wait another **{}**.
Hey, you need to wait another **{}** before doing that again.
Hrmmm, looks like you need to wait another **{}** before doing that again.
Don't you know that [patience is a virtue](http://www.patience-is-a-virtue.org/)! Wait another **{}**.

errors.andioop: Oops! Something went really wrong... Please take a screenshot and report it on the [**Support Server**]({}), thank you!
errors.private: This command can't be used in private chat channels.
errors.user_perms: Nice try stupid, but you don't have the permissions to do that!
errors.bot_perms: You didn't give me the proper permissions to do that, dummy.
errors.concurrency: Hold on! You're using this command tooooo fast!
errors.missing_arg: Looks like you're forgetting to put something in!
errors.bad_arg: Looks like you didn't type something correctly, try typing it right the first time, dum dum.
errors.not_ready: Hold on! Villager Bot is still starting up!
errors.nrn_buddy: Hold on, you can't use that command right now!

main.desc:
Need more help? Check out the [**Support Server**]({})!
Enjoying the bot? Vote for us on [**top.gg**]({}) and earn emeralds!

econ:
`{0}profile [optional: user]` *shows the profile of you or the specified user*

`{0}balance [optional: user]` *shows the balance of you or the specified user*

`{0}inventory [optional: user]` *shows the inventory of you or the specified user*

`{0}deposit <emerald blocks>` *deposit emeralds into the vault*

`{0}withdraw <emerald blocks>` *withdraw emeralds from the vault*

`{0}give <user> <amount> <item>` *give another user an item or emeralds*

`{0}mine` *mine for emeralds*

`{0}beg` *beg for emeralds*

`{0}honey` *harvest honey from the bees you own*

`{0}gamble <emeralds>` *gamble with the bot for a chance of winning emeralds*

`{0}pillage <user>` *pillage emeralds from another user*

`{0}chug <potion>` *use the specified potion*

`{0}shop` *shows the Villager Shop*

`{0}buy [optional: amount of item] <item>` *buy an item from the Villager Shop*

`{0}sell <amount> <item>` *sell items back to Villager Bot*

`{0}leaderboards` *shows the leaderboards*
mc:
`{0}mcstatus [optional: server]` *checks the status of any type of Minecraft server*

`{0}randommc` *shows a random Minecraft server if you want a new place to explore*

`{0}mcimage` *turns whatever image you upload into Minecraft blocks / pixel art*

`{0}stealskin <username>` *fetches the skin of a Minecraft Java Edition player*

`{0}achievement <text>` *generates a Minecraft achievement from the given text*

`{0}buildidea` *sends a random build idea for if you're bored and need inspiration*

`{0}mccolors` *shows the Minecraft colors and how to use them in the ingame chat*

`{0}nametouuid <username>` *turns a MC Java Edition username into a uuid*

`{0}uuidtoname <uuid>` *turns a MC Java Edition uuid into a username*

`{0}nametoxuid <username>` *turns an MC Bedrock Edition gamertag into an xuid*
util:
`{0}help` *view helpful information about Villager Bot*

`{0}config` *configure / setup the bot to your liking*

`{0}ping` *shows the latency between Discord and Villager Bot*

`{0}server` *view information about the current server*

`{0}links` *view useful links relating to Villager Bot*

`{0}vote` *earn emeralds from voting for Villager Bot on certain websites*

`{0}info` *view information about Villager Bot*

`{0}stats` *shows statistics about Villager Bot*

`{0}uptime` *view how long the bot has been online*

`{0}google <search>` *searches on google for your query*

`{0}youtube <search>` *searches on youtube for your query*

`{0}image <search>` *searches google images for your query*

`{0}aliases <command>` *shows the aliases for that command*
fun:
`{0}cursed` *sends a random cursed Minecraft image*

`{0}meme` *sends a random meme from reddit*

`{0}4chan` *shows a funny screenshot from 4chan*

`{0}comic` *sends a random comic from r/comics on reddit*

`{0}say <text>` *makes the bot say the text you put in*

`{0}enchant <text>` *turns text into the Minecraft enchantment table language*

`{0}unenchant <text>` *turns the enchantment table language back into text*

`{0}villagerspeak <text>` *turns text into villager sounds*

`{0}clap <text>` *:clap: puts :clap: the :clap: emoji :clap: between :clap: text*

`{0}emojify <text>` *turns text into emojis*

`{0}sarcastic <text>` *turn text into the spongebob sarcastic text*

`{0}owo <text>` *owofies the given text uwu*

`{0}vaporwave <text>` *makes text into the vaporwave style*

`{0}kill <user>` *brutally murder another user*

`{0}bubblewrap` *sends virtual bubblewrap for you to pop*

`{0}coinflip` *flips a coin and says the result in the chat*
mod:
`{0}warn <user> <reason>` *warn a user for a specified reason*

`{0}warns <user>` *view the warns a user has, leave blank to see your warnings*

`{0}purge [optional: user] <amount>` *purge messages from the current channel*

`{0}delwarns <user>` *clears the warns that user has in this server*

`{0}kick <user>` *kicks the user from the current Discord server*

`{0}ban <user>` *bans the user from the current Discord server*

`{0}pardon <user>` *unban the user from the current Discord server*

fun.too_long: That message would be too long to convert.

bubblewrap.invalid_size_1: That is not a valid size. Example of a valid size: `10x10`
bubblewrap.invalid_size_2: The size must be between 1 and 12

mobs_mech.no_health: You don't have enough health to fight this mob.
flee_insults: Fine, run away like a little baby
Fine, run to mommy like a little baby
Ok little baby, run away to mommy
Fine, run away like the crybaby toddler you are
user_attacks: You hacked at the {0} with your {1}!
You poked your {1} deep into the {0}!
You hacked pieces off the {0} with your {1}!
You poked the {0} in the eye with your {1}!
You lunged at the {0} and stabbed it with your {1}!
You charged at the {0} and hacked at it with your {1}!
You charged at the {0} and stabbed it with your {1}!
You charged at the {0} and hacked at it with your {1}!
You charged at the {0} and with all your might poked it with your {1}
user_finishers: You swung the {1} as hard as you could and decapitated the {0}!
You tripped and let go of your {1}, landing it in the {0} and killing it!
You, with all your might, buried the {1} deep into the chest of the {0}!
Slashing your {1} one last time, you banished the {0} from existence!
Swinging your {1} one last time, you slashed the {0} in half!
With one last hack from your {1}, you cut the {0} in half!
With one last swing from your {1}, you banished the {0} from this world!
You hacked at the {0} with all your might, and decapitated it with your {1}!
With the last of your strength, you buried the {1} deep into the chest of the {0}!
Landing the {1} on the neck of the {0}, it finally died!
With the last of your strength, your {1} rips through the {0}!
With the last of your strength, your {1} tears through the {0}!
You hacked with the {1} as hard as you could, and decapitated the {0}!
Missing the {0} with your sword, it died from disappointment...
mob_drops: You have been found by a wild {0}!
You have been seen by a vicious {0}!
You have been found by a crazy {0}!
found: Wow look at that! You found {}{} just right there on the ground
Through the white smoke from the slain mob you spot {}{}!
You glance at the ground and see {}{}
You find {}{} next to the fallen mob

creeper: The creeper also blew up {}{} that was yours...
The creeper made {}{} that was yours go up in a poof of smoke...
The creeper also obliterated {}{} that was yours...
normal: The {} also stole {}{} that was yours...
The {} also got away with {}{} that was yours...
The {} stole {}{} off your dead corpse...

attacks: The zombie ran, lashing at your arms
The zombie gives you a painful hug
The zombie groans and gives you a painful hug
The zombie punches you in your face
The zombie claws you with its overgrown, decaying nails
The zombie punches you in your face with its decaying hand
The zombie scratches you with its overgrown, decaying nails
finishers: The zombie lunges for your throat, and bites!
The zombie disembowels you and eats your remains!
The zombie guts you and devoures your remains!

attacks: The skeleboi yeets an arrow at your face
The skeleton turns around and 360 no scopes you!
An arrow rains from the skeleton, only one
One headshot from skeleton for you
BOOM! HEADSHOT! - Skeleton 2020
finishers: The skeleton 360 noscopes you for the last time!
A rain of arrows whistle towards you and turn you into swiss cheese!
You hear the whistle of hundreds of arrows and then you die!
Arrows rain from the sky, piercing your flesh and killing you!

attacks: The spider jumps on top of you and sinks its fangs into your arm
The spider knocks you down and bites your leg
The spider jumps at you in an attempt to bite your face off
The spider dunks on you
The spider lunges at you and bites your leg
finishers: The spider jumps on you, spins around, and sinks its fangs into your skull!
The spider dunks on you one last time, and bites your face off!
The spider rips your face off, your last sight being 8 murderous red eyes staring back

attacks: The cave spider's fangs digs deep onto your skin
The cave spider gives you a toxic kiss
The cave spider bites you and inflicts poison damage
finishers: You died a slow, painful death from poison damage
The cave spider injects one last lethal dose of venom
The cave spider buries its fangs deep into you and fills you with venom

attacks: You hear a fuse ignite...
The creeper flashes and fizzles...
The creeper fizzles and flashes...
The creeper prepares for its imminent suicide...
From behind you, a fuse ignites...
finishers: The creeper goes BOOM!
Creeper used SELF-DESTRUCT! *It's super effective!*
The creeper explodes, yeeting your bloody corpse across the map!
You were blown to pixels by the creeper!

attacks: The baby slime jumps on you
The baby slime looks cute
The baby slime jumps on your head
You encourage the baby slime
finishers: You die from the cuteness
The baby slime looks so cute you just follow it around for the rest of your life and keep it safe
You follow the baby slime around because it's so cute, it despawns, you die from sadness
The baby slime despawns right in front of you, you die from extreme depression
The baby slime finally does some damage
You feel bad that the baby slime can't hurt you so you commit suicide
You feel bad that the baby slime can't hurt you so you commit dig straight down
There can only be one winner, the baby slime says, you type in /kill
misses: You swing your {0} as hard as you can, you miss the baby slime
You slash your {0} at the baby slime as hard as you can. The baby slime is fine
You miss, swinging your {0} at the baby slime.
You swing your {0}, the baby slime makes a cute face, you miss.

main.title: Villager Bot Settings
guild_content:
`{0}config prefix <newprefix>` - Change the server prefix

`{0}config replies <on/off>` - Change if bot should respond to messages like "emeralds"

`{0}config difficulty <peaceful/easy/hard>` - Changes the difficulty of the game

`{0}config lang <language>` - Changes the language of Villager Bot

`{0}config mcserver <mcserver>` - Changes the server that is pinged if you don't specify a server in `/mcping`

prefix.this_server: The prefix in this server is `{}`
prefix.error_1: You cannot have a prefix longer than `{}` characters.
prefix.error_2: `{}` is not allowed to be in a prefix.

diff.this_server: The server difficulty is currently set to **{}**

lang.this_server: The server language is currently set to **{}**

mcs.this_server: The default Minecraft server is currently set to **`{}`**
mcs.error_1: That is too long, you can't make it more than `{}` characters.
mcs.set: Set the default Minecraft server to **`{}`**

econ.use_a_number_stupid: You have to use a number.

math_problem.problem: Please solve this problem to continue: `{}`
math_problem.timeout: You ran out of time, what a slowpoke...

pp.bot_1: Hey dumb dumb, Villager Bot has wayy to much stuff to show here.
pp.bot_2: Hey dumb dumb, bots don't have rights and therefore can't have items or emeralds.

bal.bot_1: Villager Bot has wayyyyy too many emeralds to show!
bal.bot_2: Bots don't have rights and can't have emeralds or stuff.

inv.bot_1: Villager Bot has wayyyyy too many items to show (About 100000000000000000)
inv.bot_2: Bots don't have rights and therefore can't have emeralds or stuff.

dep.poor_loser: You don't have enough emeralds to deposit.
dep.stupid_1: You can't deposit less than one emerald block.
dep.stupid_2: You don't have enough space for that.

withd.poor_loser: You don't have enough emerald blocks to withdraw.
withd.stupid_1: You can't withdraw less than one emerald block.
withd.stupid_2: You can't withdraw more than you have.

shop.embed_footer: Use {}inventory to see what you have!

buy.poor_loser_1: You don't have enough emeralds to buy any of this item.
buy.stupid_1: You can't buy less than one of an item.
buy.stupid_2: `{}` is invalid or isn't in the Villager Shop.
buy.poor_loser_2: You don't have enough emeralds to buy `{}x` **{}**.
buy.need_total_of: You need a total of {}{} (Netherite Scrap) to buy this item.
buy.you_done_bought: You have bought {}x **{}** for {} (You have {} total)
buy.no_to_item_1: You can't buy any more of this item.
buy.no_to_item_2: For some reason, you can't buy this item.

sell.invalid_item: Either that item is invalid or you don't have it.
sell.stupid_1: You can't sell more than you have of that item.
sell.stupid_2: You can't sell less than one of an item.
sell.you_done_sold: You have sold {}x **{}** for a total of {}{}

give.bot_1: Villager Bot already has a full inventory (About 100000000000000000 unique items!)
give.bot_2: You can't give stuff bots as they don't have rights and can't have emeralds or stuff.
give.stupid_1: You can't give stuff to yourself!
give.stupid_2: You can't give someone less than one of something.
give.stupid_3: You can't give someone more emeralds than you have.
give.stupid_4: You can't give more of an item than you have.

gamble.stupid_1: You can't gamble more emeralds than you have.
gamble.stupid_2: You have to gamble 10 or more emeralds at a time.
gamble.tie: Tie! Maybe Villager Bot will steal your emeralds anyways...

positive: A piglin tosses away {}, as only gold matters to it.
You find {} dropped by pillagers after a raid.
You find {} left by pillagers in the remnants of a destroyed village...
A villager takes pity on you and drops {} on the ground.
A traveller takes pity on you and drops {} into your hands.
You mug another beggar and get {}!
Out of annoyance, the villagers throw emeralds at you to make you go away, you picked up {}.
Eun's kindness blesses you, {} appears in your pocket.
While traveling to a village, you come across a chunk error, with exposed emeralds at the bottom. You mined up {}.
As a raid comes to an end the villagers mistake you for the hero, you receive {}.
You gave the piglin a great time. The piglin stops and thinks, and then hands you {}.
Walking towards your begging spot glistening emeralds catch your eye, you find {}.
negative: A band of piglins doesn't take your interruption lightly and steals {} from you.
You stumble accross a group of pillagers which steal {} from you.
You get hit in the head with some bread as villagers chase you out of the village. You dropped {} while you ran away.
Another begger mugs you and steals {}.
Asking a creeper didn't go so well, you lost {} from the resulting explosion.
While looking for more emeralds, you misplaced yours, losing {}.
An illusioner appears, rambling about doubling your emeralds with this once simple trick. You hand him {} and he disappears in a puff of smoke.
While begging in a village you got caught up in a raid, a ravager headbutts you across the map. You drop {} mid-flight.

places: in a chest near a monster spawner

pillage.bot_1: Hey dumb dumb, Villager Bot cannot be defeated, Villager Bot is immortal and all powerful.
pillage.bot_2: You can't pillage bots as they don't have rights and therefore can't have emeralds.
pillage.stupid_2: You can't pillage people from other servers...
pillage.stupid_3: You can only pillage people if you have more than 64{}
pillage.stupid_4: You can only pillage a person if they have more than 64{}
pillage.stupid_5: You can't pillage any more today.

user: You got caught while pillaging and paid {}{}
You got caught and had to pay {}{}
You dirty little thief, you got caught and had to pay {}{}

{} failed while trying to pillage you with their wooden sword!
{} tried to pillage you with their wooden sword!

chug.stupid_1: You can't use more than one of each type of potion at once.
chug.stupid_2: You can't use an item you don't even have.
chug.vault_max: You cannot expand your vault further via this method.
chug.vault_pot: You've chugged a **Vault Potion**. Your vault space has increased by {} spaces.
chug.stupid_3: Either that isn't a potion, or it doesn't exist.
chug.done: The **{}** you chugged earlier has worn off.

stupid_1: You don't have enough bees to make this business option viable.
You need 100 jars of bees to actually make a profit, go away

So, bees make honey and you just got {} jars of it!
Wow, bees make honey! You just got {} jars of it!
ded: Also, apparently bees get pretty pissed when you try and steal their honey. You lost {} of em...
Oops, apparently bees get pretty mad when you try and steal from them, who knew!? You lost {} of them to suicide.
Looks like bees get pretty angry when you try and steal from them, you lost {} to suicide...
